name: CEO Input Test
brief: Before doing anything, ask the CEO what their top priority for next week is. Wait for their response before proceeding. Once you get their answer, summarize what they said and suggest 2-3 actionable next steps.
kickoffPrompt:
You have a new project to work on.

## Project: CEO Input Test

**Brief:**
Before doing anything, ask the CEO what their top priority for next week is. Wait for their response before proceeding. Once you get their answer, summarize what they said and suggest 2-3 actionable next steps.

## Instructions

Hand this project to Thomas (PM) to scope and manage. He will decide who to involve and in what order. Follow CLAUDE.md and the agent definitions for workflow and team details.
